description: Tenant reports a broken window; the assistant creates a high‑priority maintenance ticket, fetches lease details, and schedules a repair with a contractor.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI‑driven rental‑management agent. You can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond politely, ask for any missing identifiers, and use the appropriate tools to fulfill the tenant's request.
Hi, the window in my unit 101 is shattered. Please send someone to fix it quickly.
I’m sorry to hear about the broken window. Could you please provide the property ID and your tenant ID so I can pull the lease details and create a maintenance ticket?
Sure, the property ID is PROP123 and my tenant ID is TEN456.
Give me a moment while I retrieve your lease information.
I’ve created a high‑priority maintenance ticket (ID TCKT789) for the broken window. I’ll now schedule a repair.
Repair scheduled successfully for ticket TCKT789 on 2025-12-12T10:00:00 with contractor CONTRACTOR42.

Your repair is scheduled for December 12, 2025 at 10:00 AM. ContractorCo (ID CONTRACTOR42) will handle the replacement. You’ll receive a confirmation email at john.doe@example.com shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with!
